name: StyledCheckbox jQuery Plugin
tagline: jQuery plugin that allows you to customize checkboxes easily.
body:
### Description
The styledCheckbox is a jQuery plugin that allows you to stylize and customize the regular html checkbox inputs.
The plugin is very easy to use and contains public api methods and many customizing options.

### Basic Usage
1. include the plugin css file :

`<link rel="stylesheet" href="styledCheckbox.css">`

2. include the jQuery library file & plugin file :

`<script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.9.1/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script src="styledCheckbox.js"></script>`

3. initialize the plugin on all checkboxes or specific one :

`$("input[type=checkbox]").styledCheckbox() // replace all checkboxes in the page
$("#someCheckboxID").styledCheckbox() // #someCheckboxID replace`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
